name: linux_users_check
pattern: {"platform": "linux", "description": "ATT&CK: T1136,T1078", "queries": {"linux_users": {"query": "select * from users;", "interval": 3600, "description": "Lists all create and deleted account - ATT&CK T1136,T1078,T1184,T1021"}, "linux_logged_users": {"query": "select datetime(time,'unixepoch','UTC') as time_utc,host,user,tty,pid,type from logged_in_users;", "interval": 3600, "description": "Lists all logged in users - ATT&CK T1136,T1078,T1169,T1184,T1021"}, "linux_last_logged_users": {"query": "select datetime(time,'unixepoch','UTC') as time_utc,host,username,tty,pid,type from last;", "interval": 3600, "description": "Lists last logged in users - ATT&CK T1136,T1078"}}, "name": "linux_users_check"}
